galoisienne

  1. feminine singular of galoisien
    • 2015, Michel Emsalem, “Twisting by a torsor”, in arXiv‎[1] (in English):
      For instance one finds in the paragraph 5.3 of the book "cohomologie galoisienne" by Serre, the description of the "opération de torsion" in a particular context.
